title: HuntWise Wind Interaction
description:
A subtle interaction to see wind and weather info for a user's hunting location.

The particle effect uses wind speed and direction variables from the current selected time.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: HuntWise Prediction UI
description:
An interface for hunters to see the best times to hunt, and why those times are the best.

This design was based on metrics, testing, and feedback that resulted in a good balance of visuals and usablility.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: HuntWise Details
description:
A couple designs from the prediction section of HuntWise.

Details and dimensions are super important to show. Without showcasing what a dev needs to pay attention to, the end result could be very different from the design.

(I am no longer apart of this project)

title: Material Message
description:
An idea I had to transform a simple button into a larger surface.

This is made with jQuery listening for css transition changes and conditions.

title: Word Nerd
description:
A game where you rhyme with as many words as possible without letting the timer end. (Like Flappy Bird for rhyming)

Users are scored based on the amount of syllables they use.

title: CoffeeCram Onboarding
description:
A subtle transition that links the user's touch position to a background opacity change.

Essentially, a UIView is changing it's alpha value based on the offset of the x-position in the UICollectionView. That same x-position also changes the position of the pagination dot.

Written in Swift.

title: Simple Scale
description:
A fun weight tracking app without any extra clutter!

All the controls and views (including the graph!) are custom. User data is written and read with Firebase's realtime database and authentication.

The app supports 6 languages, and has a mostly international user base.

title: Restaurant Menu UI
description: An interface for a restaurant chain with blends ideas from real world menus and common app layouts.

title: Restraunt App Details
description:
